nodes.text: This Neimoidian served as an aide to Senator Lott Dod during the Clone Wars.

The aide accompanied Lott Dod to Toydaria in 22 BBY to conduct negotiations with King Katuunko. He later dined with Dod, Katuunko, and several Toydarian ministers during a ceremonial dinner. As the dinner wore on, Jar Jar Binks attempted to draw attention away from several supply ships being launched from the base of the castle. The aide was quite impressed with Jar Jar's abilities.
